short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quicktab removes the new tab site and replaces it with a new background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quicktab: Elevate your browsing experience with Quicktab, the extension that effortlessly refreshes your new tab background image. Enjoy a delightful blend of fun and personalization, while also boosting productivity and finding inspiration with every new tab you open. Make your browsing moments uniquely yours!
